mapper.select: select serve.id, serve.sale_status, serve.serve_item_id, item.name as serve_item_name, item.serve_type_id, serve.region_id, item.reference_price, serve.price, serve.is_hot, serve.create_time, serve.update_time, type.id serve_type_id, type.name serve_type_name from serve inner join serve_item as item on serve.serve_item_id=item.id inner join serve_type as type on item.serve_type_id=type.id where serve.region_id=#{regionId}
